Method Detail

isOk

protected boolean isOk(y.base.Node node)
Description copied from class: AbstractBfsIterator
Determines whether this node is ok, that is belongs to the specific class of nodes. For example if this method always returns true, this iterator will iterate over all maximal connected components of the graph.

Specified by:
isOk in class AbstractBfsIterator
Parameters:
node - node to check
Returns:
true if this node is ok;
